type.description:
## Amount

---



[Damage Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/damage_condition_types/amount)

Checks whether the damage is of a specified amount.

Type ID: `origins:amount`




---

### Examples

```json
"damage_condition": {
    "type": "origins:amount",
    "comparison": "==",
    "compare_to": 4
}
```

This example will check if the damage dealt/taken is equal to 2 hearts.
